DOC.detailed_description: Thirty two septic shock patient require vasopressor support maintain mean arterial pressure 65 75 mmHg despite adequate volume resuscitation enrol study . Patients randomly allocate treat either ) titrate phenylephrine , b ) titrate norepinephrine ( control ; n = 16 ) , achieve mean arterial pressure ( MAP ) 65 75 mmHg , necessary .
